body.p: Aaron G. Scott, ^Mark Scott & Norflet Jones & S. C. Campbell^ E. B. Hooper, R P. Dawson and Eli Nicholl say, they are acquainted with Mrs Mary Wadlington wife of Thos B. Wadlington, and with her general Moral character. They say, that she is a kind & good neighbor a good wife and mother. That from their knowledge of her good character they do verily believe that any statement she has or may make under oath is entitlted to full credit. They say they are her immediate neighbors, and have Known her for many years.

A. G. Scott
Mark Scott
Norblet. Jones
E B Hooper
R P Dawson
Eli Nichels
S. C. Campbell
Sworn to and subscribed ^& every to^ before me by the above named Scott, Hooper, Dawson & Nichols ^& Scott & Jones & Campbell^ -- This 29th Jany 1861.
W. S. Talbott. P. J. T. P.
